AttackModel.NameOfTheChallenge: Access Denied 1.2 2018 â€“ JS and JQuery
AttackerCapabilities: Ability to identify errors in JavaScript code

Vulnerabilities: Syntax error in the JQuery library

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker is analyzing the browser console to find any potential vulnerabilities or errors.
StepDetails.Action: Inspect the browser console for any error messages.
StepDetails.Result: Identify an 'Unexpected token' syntax error in the JQuery library.

Steps.Description: Investigate the source of the error

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker believes that the error in the JQuery library may reveal sensitive information.
StepDetails.Action: Navigate to the portion of the JavaScript file causing the error.
StepDetails.Result: Find the flag 'accessdenied{1t_w4s_h1dd3n_h3r3_594a9sd}' in the JavaScript code.
